content: **errata** - we made a correction how to pick up the stitches for the trunk v 2 is the updated version a nice project for leftover yarn in regia 4-ply - to be used as hanging ornaments or as gift tag at the place where the kemijoki and ounasjoki rivers come together in rovaniemi the capital of lapland you can find the santa claus village crossed by the arctic circle it is said that this is santa s official hometown here you can meet him in his workshop or send a wish list at the post office you can now bring a little of this christmas magic home with the kemijoki christmas trees perhaps you will put one of the small trees in an envelope along with your wish list and send it to finland santa will be happy
